By checking the box you agree to our
Bento Box with Karaage as a main is called Karaage Bento. It consists of cooked rice, karaage (Japanese fried chicken) and a small amount of a few side dishes.

Seafood yaki udon is a Japanese seafood udon stir fry that’s easy, and delicious. It’s made with assorted seafood like shrimp, squid, and scallops that are tossed with chewy udon noodles and a simple savory sauce.
Tonkotsu ramen has five major ingredients. Broth,noodles,pork,egg,tare.Tonkotsu broth is the heart and soul of any tonkotsu ramen. It’s not difficult but it takes time – 12 to 18 hours.

Takoyaki is a dish made of wheat batter and filling, usually octopus or a similar type of seafood. Takoyaki is grilled in pans with small half-dome compartments and then flipped to give them their round shape.
Tempura is a typical Japanese dish that usually consists of seafood and vegetables that have been coated in a thin batter and deep fried.
Is a Japanese type of skewered chicken. Its preparation involves attaching the meat to a skewer, typically made of steel, bamboo, or similar materials, after which it is grilled over a charcoal fire.
Yakisoba is a fried noodle dish made by barbecuing or stir-frying a combination of noodles, sliced cabbage, pork, carrot and other vegetables, and a barbecue style yakisoba sauce.
